overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total follower base of 3,580. His content ranges from academic achievements to job opportunities, reflecting his professional focus on computational social science and disinformation. Engagement is consistent across platforms, with LinkedIn showing the highest individual post engagement.
